original_text: Thus the Lord saved Hezekiah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem from the hand of Sennacherib the king of Assyria, and from the hand of all other, and guided them on every side.
korean_text: 이와 같이 여호와께서 히스기야와 예루살렘 주민을 앗수르 왕 산헤립의 손과 모든 적국의 손에서 구원하여 내사 사면으로 보호하시매

sentences.original_text: from the hand of Sennacherib king of Assyria
and from the hand of all other
and guided them on every side
